Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.framework

Defines some common types used throughout the library.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ActivityResultHandler.Event This interface will be eventually invoked when the activity has returned a result.
BusinessObjectLifeCycle<BusinessObjectClass> An interface which is bound to a business object.
Commands Defines contracts for designing commands on a business object.
Commands.Executable<BusinessObjectClass> The interface that makes possible to run a command on a business object.
DetailsProvider.ForList<BusinessObjectClass,ViewClass>  
DetailsProvider.ForListHandler<BusinessObjectClass> Introduced in order to define the contract between a list view and its adapter .
DetailsProvider.ForListView<BusinessObjectClass,ViewClass>  
Events In order to provide closure events.
Events.OnBusinessCompletion<BusinessObjectClass>  
 

Class Summary
ActivityResultHandler Enables to handle the launching of an activity and have the handling of the result in one place.
ActivityResultHandler.CompositeHandler  
ActivityResultHandler.Handler  
Commands.EnabledExecutable<BusinessObjectClass> Here, no need to indicate whether the command is enabled or not: it is always enabled.
Commands.StaticEnabledExecutable  
Commands.StaticExecutable  
DetailsProvider Introduced in order to define various contract between: a list view and its adapter, a grid view and its adapter.
ForBusinessObjectImplementation<BusinessObjectClass> A basic implementation.
SmartAdapters Gathers in one place some classes used by the AbstractSmartListActivity class, which handles list views.
SmartAdapters.BusinessViewHolder<BusinessObjectClass> This class wraps the SmartAdapters.BusinessViewWrapper when not used inside a list.
SmartAdapters.BusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass> Wraps a business object and its underlying Android View in a list or a grid.
SmartAdapters.SimpleBusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass> A basic wrapper implementation, which lets specify its getType(int, Object) and representation layout identifier used to inflate it.
 

Enum Summary
SmartAdapters.ObjectEvent Indicates the type of action on the underlying business object.
 

Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.framework Description

Defines some common types used throughout the library.
